overview: This movie stars Sammy Case in his most incredible role. Hooking up with Kevin Shade, he and Sammy take turns topping each other in a truly sensational sex scene. This one is not to be missed. No real story line in this movie, just HOT twinks having sex time after time. Kevin Shade shines in his first movie and Sammy puts on his best performance ever. 2005 GAYVN nominated Best Specialty Video 18-23.
title: Twinkalicious
